channel.title: Example on A minimal Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content in Example on A minimal Hugo website

item.title: A Plain Markdown Post
item.description:
This sample post is mainly for blogdown users. If you do not use blogdown, you can skip the first section.

1. Markdown or R Markdown

This post is written in plain Markdown (*.md) instead of R Markdown (*.Rmd). The differences include:

  1. You cannot run any R code in a plain Markdown document, whereas in R Markdown you can embed R code chunks.
  2. A plain Markdown post is rendered via Goldmark, while R Markdown is compiled with rmarkdown and Pandoc.

Note on LaTeX:
As of Hugo v0.122.0, you can enable LaTeX math using standard syntax:
